original_title: President makes special statement to Parliament after tabling IMF report
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe tabled the agreement reached with the IMF for a bailout package, in Parliament on Wednesday (22). The President also made a special statement to the house.
Sri Lanka received an immediate disbursement of over USD 300 Mn from IMF – President
Moragoda meets Indian Finance Minister, thanks India for support on IMF bailout package
President makes special statement to Parliament after tabling IMF report
